mapper.select: SELECT h_id, htime_week, htime_opening, htime_closing, htime_isable FROM hospital_time WHERE h_id = #{hospitalId} AND htime_week = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%W');
SELECT h_lunch_time_start, h_lunch_time_end, h_interval_time FROM hospital WHERE h_id = #{hospitalId}

SELECT r.reserv_id, r.reserv_date, TIME_FORMAT(r.reserv_time, '%H:%i') AS reserv_time, p.pet_picture, p.pet_name, h.h_name FROM reservation r JOIN pet p ON r.pet_id = p.pet_id JOIN hospital h ON r.h_id = h.h_id WHERE r.user_id = #{id} AND DATE(r.reserv_date) >= CURDATE() order by reserv_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (h_id, user_id, pet_id, reserv_date, reserv_time, reserv_apply_time, reserv_content, reserv_status) VALUES (#{hId}, #{userId}, #{petId}, #{reservDate}, #{reservTime}, NOW(), #{reservContent},#{reservStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT r.reserv_id, r.pet_id, r.h_id, r.reserv_date, DATE_FORMAT(r.reserv_time, '%H:%i') AS reserv_time, r.reserv_content, r.reserv_status, h.h_name, p.pet_name, p.pet_age, p.pet_gender, p.pet_species, p.pet_breed FROM reservation r JOIN hospital h ON r.h_id = h.h_id JOIN pet p ON r.pet_id = p.pet_id WHERE r.reserv_id = #{reserv_id}

SELECT r.reserv_id, u.name, u.phone, r.reserv_date, time_format(r.reserv_time,'%H:%i') as reserv_time, p.pet_name, date(r.reserv_apply_time) AS reserv_apply_time, r.reserv_content, r.reserv_memo, r.reserv_status FROM reservation r JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN pet p ON r.pet_id = p.pet_id Where r.h_id=#{h_id} AND reserv_date=CURDATE() ORDER BY r.reserv_time ASC
